result.title: Contract/Flexible Work
result.description: Expand your work options by joining the flexible work community at GoingFlex.  Get involved with project/contract based opportunities, part-time opportunities, or simply selling your services (professional or personal) on an hourly or fixed-price basis to local & global clients.  Simply signup for a free account at www.goingflex.com to get started.
result.notes: Only fully completed profiles will be considered for opportunities. No requirement on visa status since work can mostly be done remotely.
